subject: Coaches and Managers
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi started a Class AAA call-up in left field and was rewarded with a two-run double; Jerry Manuel called on a Class AAA call-up to pitch in the seventh and watched the Yankees take the lead.
snippet: Joe Girardi started a Class AAA call-up in left field and was rewarded with a two-run double; Jerry Manuel called on a Class AAA call-up to pitch in the seventh and watched the Yankees take the lead.
